The letter image was published on Facebo: 2019, and has been shared more than 3,500 times.
The post: s caption on Facebook translates to English as: "Carrie Lam finally take another action, extradition bill resuming its second reading, the bitch deceived Hong Kong citizens by the so-called withdrawal!"
The image shows an official Hong Kong go: 2019, with specific references to legislative council paper number "CB(2)1957/18-19(01)" and the Secretary for Security.
The letter: s content mentions the intention to give notice for the bill to resume its Second Reading Debate at the first Council meeting of the 2019-2020 legislative session for the purpose of making an announcement for the withdrawal of the Bill.
